title: Week 3 TNF Preview
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live crew give their thoughts on the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Steelers and the Browns and the upcoming showdown between Aaron Rodgers and Tom Brady. The crew also discusses teams that are struggling offensively, provides injury updates, and much more.
